trans-unit.source:
The @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ login {0} has been deactivated in response to your request.
Thank you for contacting @@VENDOR_NAME@@.
@@PRODUCT_NAME@@ login creation request
For additional information in German language, please visit our Website: {0}
For French, click here: {0}

context-group.name: ctx
context-group.context: {0} - URL to German website containing French and German text

trans-unit.source:
Dear @@VENDOR_NAME@@ Customer,
You were recently named on an order for new @@VENDOR_NAME@@ subscriptions. These subscriptions are now available in the following account:
Customer Name : {0} Account Number: {1}
You can click on the link below to create a new @@VENDOR_NAME@@ Login for this account and obtain access to your subscriptions:
{2}
If you are not the technical manager who will utilize the @@VENDOR_NAME@@ subscription services purchased, please forward this email to the appropriate user within your organization. If they do not already have a @@VENDOR_NAME@@ Login, that user may follow the link above to establish a new one.
If you already have a login and it is linked to the above account, then no action is required. You can find the account number linked to an existing Red Hat Login by logging into the following page:
http://www.novell.com/center/
If you already have a @@VENDOR_NAME@@ Login that is linked to a different account than the one listed on this email, and would like to use that account to manage these subscriptions, @@VENDOR_NAME@@ can transfer them to your desired account. Please contact your regional @@VENDOR_NAME@@ Customer Service Representative, using the contact information provided at the following link:
{3}
Note to the Account Administrator (Organization Administrator): Before a new user can access subscriptions, you must grant them the ability to see and manage the subscriptions on your account. This requires that a User Administration entitlement exist on your account. If required, please follow the link above and contact your regional @@VENDOR_NAME@@ Customer Service Representative to request this feature.
Thank you for choosing @@VENDOR_NAME@@.
Sincerely, @@VENDOR_NAME@@ Account Management Team

context-group.name: ctx
context-group.context: {0} - Customers name - Web_Customer.name - Michael Bowman {1} - Account number - 012543 {2} - Creation url - http://blah/CreatePersonal.do?checksum=$1$a322349ade {3} - Customer Server url - http://blah/about/contact/dir/#custservice

trans-unit.source: Your @@VENDOR_NAME@@ system is not able to receive service

Dear @@VENDOR_NAME@@ Customer,
The following system has been associated with your @@VENDOR_NAME@@ login and account in the past day, but could not be entitled to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ services.
{0}
There are several reasons why this may have occurred:
1) You recently reinstalled a system and are attempting to associate the system with an existing, active subscription. Please ensure you delete your existing system profile on @@PRODUCT_NAME@@.
2) The number of systems you have connected to @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ exceeds the number of active @@VENDOR_NAME@@ subscriptions associated with your account. This may be because your subscriptions have expired or you need to purchase a @@VENDOR_NAME@@ subscription.
To check the expiration dates of your existing @@VENDOR_NAME@@ subscriptions, please visit:
https://www.novell.com/center/
Log in and click on View and manage your subscriptions link.
3) You recently installed a @@VENDOR_NAME@@ product and your subscription number was not successfully activated. If you would like to try and activate your subscription again, please visit:
https://www.novell.com/center/
For additional questions, please contact a @@VENDOR_NAME@@ Customer Service representative at:
http://support.novell.com/contact/index.html
Thank you for using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@.

trans-unit.source: --------------------- Affected Systems List --------------------- This Patch Advisory may apply to the systems listed below. If you know that this patch does not apply to a system listed, it might be possible that the package profile for that server is out of date. In that case you should run 'up2date -p' (RHEL 4 and below) or 'rhn-profile-sync' (SLES, RHEL 5 and above) as root on the system in question to refresh your software profile.
There is 1 affected system registered in 'Overview' (only systems for which you have explicitly enabled Patch Alerts are shown).
There are {0} affected systems registered in 'Overview' (only systems for which you have explicitly enabled Patch Alerts are shown).

trans-unit.source: @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate expiration warning

Dear @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ User,
This email is being sent to you to inform you that your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate has expired on your {0} server. After {1} day(s) the systems management services provided by your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Server will become inaccessible.

context-group.name: ctx
context-group.context: {0} - Hostname of the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Whose Cert has Expired: highwind.devel.redhat.com {1} - Days Until satellite certificate expiration: 7

Thank you for using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. --the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Team

Please contact your regional @@VENDOR_NAME@@ Customer Service Representative for information on how to renew your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate.
Thank you for using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. --the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Team

Dear @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ User,
